config_entry_unique_id_collision.description:
There are multiple {domain} config entries with the same unique ID.
The config entries are named {titles}.

To fix this error, [configure the integration]({configure_url}) and remove all except one of the duplicates.

Note: Another group of duplicates may be revealed after removing these duplicates.
config_entry_unique_id_collision.title: Multiple {domain} config entries with same unique ID

config_entry_unique_id_collision_many.description:
There are multiple ({number_of_entries}) {domain} config entries with the same unique ID.
The first {title_limit} config entries are named {titles}.

To fix this error, [configure the integration]({configure_url}) and remove all except one of the duplicates.

Note: Another group of duplicates may be revealed after removing these duplicates.
config_entry_unique_id_collision_many.title: Multiple {domain} config entries with same unique ID

imperial_unit_system.title: The imperial unit system is deprecated

init.description: The integration `{domain}` could not be found. This happens when a (custom) integration was removed from Home Assistant, but there are still configurations for this `integration`. Please use the buttons below to either remove the previous configurations for `{domain}` or ignore this.
init.title: Integration {domain} not found

entity_id.description: List of entities to force update.
entity_id.name: Entities to update
